markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 4" pfs="Standard">
[Protector's Sphere](/Spells.aspx?ID=1833)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Aura" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=206" />
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=554" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 379 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Domain**
[Protection](/Domains.aspx?ID=90)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Area** 15-foot emanation

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** sustained up to 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

A protective aura emanates out from you, safeguarding you and your allies. You gain resistance 3 to all damage. Your allies also gain this resistance while in the aura.

---
**Heightened (+1)** The resistance increases by 1.
name: Protector's Sphere
